name: Crazy Toys AR
description:
Augmented reality grab machine!
Use the AR game to grab your favorite toys!
There will be more exotic toys to come in!
Use your iPhone, in the home can live in real time with children or girlfriend to play the grab machine!
You can grab and collect more than 20 kind different toys.
We will create realistic gaming experience through augmented reality.
Please note: Crazy Toys AR is a free game.
For any suggestions on games, please contact us via email: tindle163@163.com
